Actions.Name: Wild Hunt
Actions.Description: At the start of the round, the [name] can choose an edge of the map. At the end of that round, a huge stampede of animals sweeps across the map from that end to the next. All foes take 2 damage, three times. However, characters that are standing on the other side of objects or terrain as if they were in cover from this effect are immune to it.

Actions.Name: Prance
Actions.Description: At the start of the round, the [name] flies 3 spaces, then creates a height 3 blooming tree object in any space it vacated.

Combo.Name: Breath of the Wild
Combo.Effects: Deals bonus damage and increase to large blast if it catches a tree in the area. Doesn't affect allies.

Actions.Name: Overgrow
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. At the end of that foe's turn, if they have not moved at least 4 spaces at the start of their turn, they become immobile as the undergrowth grows over their feet. This effect ends when they take any amount of damage, or they or an adjacent character can hack the growth away with the interact ability (1 action), dealing 4 piercing damage to them but ending the effect.

Actions.Name: Horn Smash
Actions.Description: A foe in range 2 is shattered. Shattered foes are shoved 2.

Actions.Name: Pollen Haze
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes in the area take 1 damage twice. A foe in the center spaces then becomes vulnerable. If the area catches a tree in the area, foes take 1 piercing damage three times instead.
